page.title: 20Fashion
page.content: Most young people in Kirkby try to keep up with the fashion. At the moment it is trendy to wear sporting types of clothes. This causes trouble in school, especially for the boys, because training shoes are not allowed and a lot of boys like to wear them. Some girls like to wear high heeled shoes but this is also not allowed in school because they are dangerous, especially walking up and down stairs. Wearing jewellery also causes problems because it is expensive and might get stolen. In fact, trying to keep up with fashion costs money and is one of the reasons why some pupils get Saturday jobs. Without this extra money they couldn't afford to buy new "gear".
